sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import GridMotion from '../components/GridMotion'; const ProjectingSigns: React.FC = () => { const headingRef = useRef(null); const contentRef = useRef(null); const ctaRef = useRef(null); // Projecting signs images for GridMotion const projectingImages = Array.from({ length: 28 }, (_, index) => { const imageNum = (index % 4) + 1; return `/projecting-signs/projecting${imageNum}.jpg`; }); useEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { ease: 'power3.out' } }); tl.fromTo( headingRef.current, { opacity: 0, x: -80, rotateY: -15 }, { opacity: 1, x: 0, rotateY: 0, duration: 1.2, delay: 0.3 } ) .fromTo( contentRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 40 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1 }, '-=0.7' ) .fromTo( ctaRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.9 }, '-=0.5' ); }, []); const styles = [ { title: 'Traditional Hanging', description: 'Classic wrought iron brackets with hand-painted wooden signs', heritage: true }, { title: 'Modern Illuminated', description: 'LED-lit acrylic and aluminum constructions for 24/7 visibility', heritage: false }, { title: 'Vintage Reproductions', description: 'Authentic period-style signage for heritage properties', heritage: true }, { title: 'Contemporary Blade', description: 'Sleek, minimalist designs in brushed metals and premium finishes', heritage: false } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* GridMotion Background */}
{/* Sophisticated Overlay */}
{/* Top Blur for Header */}
{/* Content */}
Heritage & Innovation

PROJECTING

Signs

"The ultimate statement of presence"

Commanding attention from every angle, projecting signs transform storefronts into landmarks. Where tradition meets cutting-edge design.

Explore Styles Commission Your Sign
{/* Artistic Bottom Gradient */}
{/* Styles Showcase */}
Our Craft

From Timeless Tradition to Modern Masterpieces

{styles.map((style, index) => (
{style.heritage && (
Heritage
)}

{style.title}

{String(index + 1).padStart(2, '0')}

{style.description}

View Examples
{/* Decorative corner accent */}
))}
{/* Features Section */}

Engineered for Excellence

Every projecting sign we create is a synthesis of artistry and engineering, designed to endure and inspire.

{[ { label: 'Planning Approved', icon: 'âœ“' }, { label: 'Weather Sealed', icon: 'â˜‚' }, { label: 'LED Options', icon: 'ðŸ’¡' }, { label: 'Custom Metalwork', icon: 'âš’' }, { label: 'Conservation Safe', icon: 'ðŸ›' }, { label: 'Lifetime Warranty', icon: 'âˆž' } ].map((feature, idx) => (
{feature.icon}
{feature.label}
))}
{/* Final CTA */}
{/* Decorative gradient orbs */}

Make Your Mark
On Every Street

Partner with master craftsmen to create a projecting sign that becomes a landmark in its own right

Start Your Project
); }; export default ProjectingSigns;
